cyclone.name: TAMMY
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest across the Leeward Islands today, then turning north-northwest and north, moving north of the northern Leeward Islands and out over the open Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or over the central/northern Leeward Islands (Guadeloupe–Antigua area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in effect for the British Virgin Islands (east of the U.S. Virgin Islands)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warnings from Guadeloupe northward through Antigua, Barbuda, St. Kitts-Nevis, Anguilla, St. Maarten/St. Martin and St. Barthelemy; Tropical Storm Warnings for Dominica, Saba and St. Eustatius
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire Leeward Islands chain with peripheral effects extending to the U.S. and British Virgin Islands and eastern Puerto Rico
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds possible Saturday night through Sunday with a 30 % cumulative chance of sustained 39+ mph winds and gusts that could approach 50 mph.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches widespread with isolated amounts up to 4 inches; localized flash flooding possible.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along exposed coasts of the Virgin Islands.
